scripts.dev:nestjs: concurrently "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm --filter frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:python: concurrently "docker-compose --profile python up --build" "pnpm --filter frontend run dev"

scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend run test && pnpm --filter frontend run test
